Actions.description: The available actions for this Resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Role.description: The Role schema contains a Redfish Role to use in conjunction with a manager account.
Role.longDescription: This Resource represents the Redfish Role for the user account.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this Resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this Resource.

AssignedPrivileges.description: The Redfish privileges for this Role.
AssignedPrivileges.longDescription: This property shall contain the Redfish privileges for this Role.  For predefined Roles, this property shall be read-only.  For custom Roles, some implementations may not allow writing to this property.

IsPredefined.description: An indication of whether the Role is a Redfish-predefined Role rather than a custom Redfish Role.
IsPredefined.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether the Role is a Redfish-predefined Role rather than a custom Redfish Role.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

OemPrivileges.description: The OEM privileges for this Role.
OemPrivileges.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM privileges for this Role.  For predefined Roles, this property shall be read-only.  For custom Roles, some implementations may not allow writing to this property.

RoleId.longDescription: This property shall contain the string name of the Role.  This property shall contain the same value as the Id property.

title: #Role.v1_2_4.Role
